sentences.en: A hasty deal was patched together.
sentences.cn: 一份协议被仓促拼凑了出来。

sentences.en: Cockburn decided it was time to beat a hasty retreat.
sentences.cn: 科伯恩认为到了该紧急撤退的时候了。

sentences.en: Donald had overturned a chair in his hasty departure.
sentences.cn: 唐纳德仓促离开时撞翻了一把椅子。

sentences.en: He soon regretted his hasty decision.
sentences.cn: 他很快就对自己仓促作出的决定感到后悔了。

sentences.en: He was sorry for his hasty words.
sentences.cn: 他对他在生气时说的话表示后悔.

sentences.en: It is unwise to be hasty in generalisation.
sentences.cn: 急于下结论是不明智的.

sentences.en: Let's not make any hasty decisions.
No ( such ) hasty decision should be made by us.
sentences.cn: 我们不可这样匆促作出决定.

sentences.en: She refused to be panicked into a hasty marriage.
sentences.cn: 她不愿因恐慌而仓促结婚。

sentences.en: She's too hasty; she should learn to think before speaking.
sentences.cn: 她太轻率了, 她应该学会话出口前想一想.

sentences.en: So let's not be hasty. After all, he can't run away.
sentences.cn: 所以我们不要鲁莽行事。毕竟他是跑不掉的。

sentences.en: Some people are prone to jump to hasty conclusions.
sentences.cn: 有些人往往作出轻率的结论.

sentences.en: The cat beat a hasty retreat when he saw the dog coming.
sentences.cn: 猫看到狗来时,就很快溜之大吉了.

sentences.en: The letter was handwritten, in a hasty, barely decipherable scrawl.
sentences.cn: 这封信是仓促手写而成，潦草得几乎无法辨认。

sentences.en: The two parties patched up a hasty peace.
sentences.cn: 双方仓促地达成停火协议.

sentences.en: We are not hasty in drawing conclusions.
We judged it better not to make a hasty decision.
sentences.cn: 我们认为最好不要匆忙作出决定.

trans.tran_cn: 仓促完成的，急忙的，草率的，轻率的
trans.tran_en: done in a hurry, especially with bad results
